attributes.action: Stop killing of Hazaras in Quetta Pakistan
attributes.additional_details:
For the last few years, there were 100s of Hazara Community being killed in different ways by the Pakistani Agencies and blaming to the terrorist group of sipa e sahaba (Saudi Arab funded Wahabis ).
We urged the Government of Pakistan to stop killing of Hazaras in Pakistan, if you cannt stop them then just leave the government.
